# Government Tender Announcement: Conveyor Maintenance
============================================

### Procurement Details

**Reference Number:** WS3527148657-Doc3779384605
**Publication Date:** 2022-12-06
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-16T14:00:00 EST
**Amendment Number:** 3
**Amendment Date:** 2023-01-09

### Contract Requirements

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites Proponents to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Conveyor Maintenance and Repair Services.

**Location:** Montréal, Québec, Canada

The Department of National Defence (DND) is the end-user entity for these services. The Requirements are detailed in Annex A of the RFP.

### Evaluation Criteria

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted by each Proponent.

### Additional Information

* This RFP cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number Doc3563400661 -W1941-230002-2, dated August 18, 2022.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on January 16, 2023.
* All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contract Details

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-08-01
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-07-31
* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

Luc Brunet
Brunet.luc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Documents

To access the RFP, please visit: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14826376?extsite=MTQ4MjYzNzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14826376?extsite=MTQ4MjYzNzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Security Requirements

Please note that this RFP contains security requirements.
